title: Diameter Request Agent - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
text: By including both the Diameter Stack and the Diameter Request agents in a workflow you enable MediationZone to act as a Diameter client. You apply a Diameter Request agent to your workflow to transmit requests from the w orkfl ow. The section has the following subsections: Diameter Request Agent Configuration Diameter Request Agent Events Diameter Request Agent Input/Output Data and MIM
